place.name: LONG LOAD
place.gazetteerText: Long Load, eccl. dist. and hamlet, Martock par., Somerset - dist., pop. 336; hamlet, 4 miles SW, of Somerton; P.O. (In 1887, John Bartholomew's Gazetteer of the British Isles)
